title: User Registration Success Flow
description: Verify user can successfully register with valid data, including email verification and initial profile setup.

steps.description: Navigate to user registration page
Input all required valid registration details (email, password, name, role)
Submit registration form
Receive confirmation prompt for email verification
Complete email verification process using link sent
Verify user account status is activated
Verify redirection to onboarding or dashboard page

title: User Authentication with Two-Factor Authentication
description: Verify the login process works with email/password and supports two-factor authentication (2FA).

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password
Submit login form
Prompt for two-factor authentication input
Provide correct 2FA code
Grant access to user dashboard

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure login fails gracefully and shows error when user inputs incorrect credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email or password
Submit login form
Show error message indicating invalid username or password

title: Password Reset Process
description: Validate that users can request a password reset and successfully change their password using the reset link.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset page
Enter registered email address
Submit password reset request
Receive email with password reset link
Open password reset link and enter a new valid password
Submit new password form
User able to login with new password

title: Company Onboarding Multi-step Registration
description: Verify guided multi-step company onboarding including pitch deck creation and data room setup.

steps.description: Login as company user
Start company onboarding process
Complete multi-step forms for company profile information
Upload pitch deck documents
Set up virtual data room with access controls
Verify all steps saved correctly and onboarding completes

title: Investor Onboarding and KYC Verification
description: Test investor registration with KYC/AML document upload and verification process.

steps.description: Navigate to investor onboarding
Enter investor profile details
Upload KYC/AML documents
System processes KYC documents for verification
Investor account activated upon successful KYC

title: Intelligent Matchmaking Filtering and Scoring
description: Verify matchmaking system returns correct filtered and scored investment opportunities or investors based on multiple criteria.

steps.description: Login as investor or company user
Apply advanced filters in matchmaking module
Matchmaking system returns opportunities/investors matching criteria
Verify compatibility scoring is displayed and consistent with input

title: Virtual Data Room Upload and Access Control
description: Test secure uploading of documents into virtual data room with granular access control and audit logging.

steps.description: Login as company user
Navigate to virtual data room
Upload valid document formats
Set access permissions for investor
Verify document is uploaded successfully, and only permitted users can access
As permitted investor, attempt to access document
Document access succeeds
As non-permitted user, attempt to access document
Access is denied
Audit logs record upload and access events correctly

title: CRM Contact Management and Pipeline Tracking
description: Confirm integrated CRM properly manages contacts, tracks sales pipelines, and supports communication channels.

steps.description: Login as company user
Add new contact to CRM
Verify contact is saved and appears in contact list
Update sales pipeline status for the contact
Verify pipeline stage is updated and visualized correctly
Send communication to contact via integrated channels
Message is sent and logged in contact communication history

title: Financial Analysis Tools Functionality
description: Verify financial modeling, automatic valuation, risk scoring, and benchmarking tools provide accurate analytics results.

steps.description: Login to company or investor dashboard
Access financial analysis tools section
Input financial data for modeling
System computes and displays automatic valuation
Risk scores are generated and displayed
Benchmarking data is shown against market averages

title: Payment Processing and Compliance Verification
description: Test end-to-end payment workflow with multi-gateway support, transaction recording, regulatory checks, and KYC/AML enforcement.

steps.description: Login as investor user
Initiate investment transaction
Complete payment using supported gateway
Payment is processed successfully and transaction is recorded
Automatic regulatory compliance checks pass
Trigger KYC/AML verification if required
Verification completes successfully before proceeding

title: Blockchain Wallet Integration and Web3 Functionality
description: Verify wallet connection, balance checking, and transaction history display through blockchain integration.

steps.description: Login and navigate to wallet interface
Connect blockchain wallet using supported method
System displays accurate real-time balance
Request transaction history data
Valid transaction history is shown chronologically

title: API Endpoint Validation for Offers CRUD
description: Ensure RESTful API endpoints for investment offers support expected CRUD operations with correct response codes and data integrity.

steps.description: Send API request to create an offer with valid payload
Receive success response with created offer details
Send API request to retrieve created offer
Offer data matches expected values
Send API request to update offer details
Update succeeds and data changes reflect
Send API request to delete the offer
Offer is removed successfully and no longer retrievable

title: UI Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Validate that the platform UI adapts correctly and remains fully functional across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open application on desktop browser with large screen
UI layout elements are rendered correctly with full functionality
Open application on tablet device or simulator
UI rearranges appropriately, navigation menus and content remain accessible
Open application on mobile phone browser
Mobile-first UI is responsive, menus collapse properly, and all interactive elements are usable

title: Access Control Enforcement in All Modules
description: Confirm that unauthorized access to restricted modules such as data room, payment system, and admin areas are blocked correctly.

steps.description: Login as a regular investor user
Attempt to access company-only restricted pages
User is denied access and redirected or shown error
Attempt to call restricted API endpoints without proper authorization
API returns authorization error(s)

title: Error Handling on File Upload with Unsupported Formats
description: Verify file upload system rejects unsupported file formats with proper error messages

steps.description: Navigate to file upload interface
Attempt to upload unsupported file format
System rejects upload and shows descriptive error message

title: Audit Logging Completeness and Accuracy
description: Verify audit logs capture all critical user activities such as logins, document access, uploads, and payment transactions.

steps.description: Perform login as any user
Audit log entry for login event is recorded with timestamp
Upload document to virtual data room
Audit log records document upload event and user info
Perform payment transaction
Audit log captures transaction details

title: Content Management System CRUD for Educational Materials
description: Validate content management allows creation, editing, viewing, and deletion of blog and educational content with markdown and rich text support.

steps.description: Login as content admin
Create a new blog post with markdown and rich text formatting
Blog post is saved and rendered correctly on public page
Edit existing educational article content
Changes appear correctly on the live content view
Delete a blog post
Post is removed and no longer accessible

title: Performance Testing Under Load
description: Ensure system maintains uptime, response times, and handles concurrent users within performance targets.

steps.description: Simulate 1000 concurrent users performing typical actions (login, matchmaking, document upload)
System response time remains within acceptable limits (< 2 seconds for API calls)
No critical errors or downtime during stress test

title: Validation of Regulatory Compliance (LGPD, Financial Regulations)
description: Verify data privacy settings, consent collection, and compliance automation functions work as required by regulations including LGPD.

steps.description: Create new user account and review consent prompts
Consent options enforceable and cannot proceed without required acceptance
Request user data export and deletion rights
System complies with data export and deletion within required timeframes
Perform compliance automation tasks during payment and KYC flows
Regulatory checks trigger correctly and block non-compliant transactions
